storyInfo: As Lemuen interrogates Exusiai, a confessional barges onto the scene to save the latter—it turns out the confessional Exusiai has been colluding with is the Doctor. Lemuen decides to let Exusiai go, as the Doctor meets up with Mon3tr to verify the cause of Laterano's various abnormalities.

attributes.content: It is the greatest graduation ceremony in the history of St. Theodore's Comprehensive School... no, the greatest ever held in the entire history of Lateran education!

Seventeen giant fireworks burst up into the air as the seventeen-year old red-haired Sankta strums her strings wildly, opening her solo concert. The sound echoes through the campus, rattling the windows of nearby school buildings.
The pews near the stage, statues, and pool... apple pies of all kinds lie everywhere as gifts for her audience.
But the entire square is empty as the red-haired Sankta plays her guitar and sings, with no teachers or students to cheer her on.

It is no rare sight to see a student planning her own graduation ceremony in Laterano, but she is not even at the age to do so. She fails to get her permission to graduate early, even if she has already completed her preparatory courses for university.
But what a sin, to complete them without a ceremonial flair!
Students open their classroom windows and watch from afar as the red-haired Sankta strums and sings without a care, until her final number. Then, they witness an unforgettable sight—
The red-haired Sankta plays her last notes, bows, and thanks the air. The school gates then burst open, as more than a hundred automated confessionals flood into the campus.
Where the audience should have been are now confessionals with their doors open, all their 'mobile electronic confessors' joining the red-haired Sankta's performance with their volume set to maximum.
Neither Laterano's largest choir nor its noisiest heavy metal band could rouse such a racket!
Finally, the Pontifica Cohors rush to restore order on campus. As they persuade the confessionals to return to their routes, however, the instigator has long vanished from the scene...
Leaving only a single banner, unfolding as the last firework goes off—
'Let's send Lemuel off on her next adventure with a bang!'
Lemuel stops over at the Lateran port.
Hah, so there's a saint statue here too!
attributes.name: Lemuel

attributes.content: Weird how I never noticed before... They're actually pretty nice to look at!
attributes.name: Lemuel

attributes.content: This is her first time leaving Laterano for a place without halos, in her search for people and answers.
She suddenly thinks, for no particular reason, of how she might not return for a long, long time.
Didn't think they'd actually let you interrogate me, sis.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: ...Only because the previous seven cardinals got nothing out of you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Come, El. Help me open this.
attributes.name: Lemuen
Exusiai
attributes.content: Why's this thing wrapped so tight—

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: Wow, a mille-feuille fruit tart?
The Seventh Tribunal is sure nice to suspects!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Come on, I made it myself. There's also this.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...Take it.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: What's that now?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Your diploma.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: After I awakened, the head of St. Theodore's—who was also mentoring me at the time—came to see me, and asked me to keep it for you.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Your application to graduate was rejected, but that ceremony you put together did indeed prove your skills.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: After all, how could you get that many confessionals to perform with you, if you weren't really familiar with their programming and the intercity net's defense patterns?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: So the school consulted the Curia, and granted you a diploma in the end.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Congratulations, El... even if it's a few years late.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hehe. Thanks, sis.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I'm sure my letters found their way to you?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Uh... yeah.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You know, I made a bet with Mamma and Tata. They said you'd major in intercity net security and become an expert in the Notarial Hall.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: But I thought you'd never waste your creative mind like that. I was sure you'd major in faith assistive engineering and design a new mobile confessional that'd shock the city.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: In the end, you left Laterano, just like that.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Let me be clear, sis. I don't regret it one bit.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You know I'm not the type, and I'm even less the type to let anyone hold any regrets for me.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Which is why you rushed all your preparatory courses and threw that wild graduation ceremony, right?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Heheh.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I peppered Mostima with questions about you. Your work in Lungmen, your boss, your coworkers...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I know you went to Siracusa, to Sargon, and many more places besides.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You deal with all sorts of people every day. Gangs, cops, famiglie, lords ameer... you're always on the move...
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Why does my life sound so different after going through a Mostima filter?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Well, I did live a nice life after leaving Laterano. Wasn't sad or anything.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I mean, you were still bedridden then. Didn't know how you got hurt, if you'd ever wake up, and Mostima refused to say a word.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I had to know what the heck happened!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You're my sister, you know?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But that woman, bless her heart, kept avoiding me. I got a whole load of nothing from her.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Don't blame Mostima.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You know, sis. I've been through a lot these past few years.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: There's some stuff I would have never thought about, if I stayed here.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: In Lungmen, Mostima was the only Sankta around, but she lost her empathy.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Texas, Sora, Croissant, Bison, and the boss... At first, I made friends with them the same way I did here.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: We're all besties now, but without empathy I sometimes still can't help but worry about silly little things...
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I've been trying hard to overcome that, and every time I do, our ties become a little stronger.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: But here, things are different. Like right now, I don't even have to think anything to know you wanna go somewhere else to give me a big proper hug.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What kind of collective has empathy turned us into?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Does it make us more, or less sensitive to others?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Does it make us so insensitive that it's easier to accept totally outrageous change?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Does this have something to do with everything you've done since you came back?
attributes.name: Lemuen
Exusiai
attributes.content: Laterano's sick, sis, just like you were back then—

attributes.name: Exusiai
attributes.content: We gotta wake it UP!
El, you need to give me more than that.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: There's Pontifica Cohors guardsmen right behind these doors, right? I heard them when I came into the room.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Let me guess, are you going to say 'this is your last chance...' or something like that?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: If you insist on refusing to explain why you disrupted the Summit of Nations and reveal the forces backing you, the Seventh Tribunal will have to hand you over to someone else.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I don't know what kind of punishment you'll face, El.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Laterano's leniency has never applied to those who violate the Law, especially these days—
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: C'mon—'Apple pie with mayonnaise!'
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Wh-What's going on? Was that an explosion downstairs?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member A

attributes.content: A terror attack?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member A

attributes.content: Aren't they interrogating the terrorism suspect upstairs right now? Who else would dare to attack the Seventh Tribunal?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member B

attributes.content: Automated Confessional, 'ELCARO-001', in position!
A-A mobile confessional?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member B

attributes.content: Fire.
attributes.name: Automated Confessional

attributes.content: Gah, what's going on? Who let that in here? Did they not realize this one's malfunctioning?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member C

attributes.content: But that's just a mobile confessional, buddy.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member D

attributes.content: Gah, who thought it'd be a good idea to put so many guns on a confessional?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member C

attributes.content: Alert! A mobile confessional is attacking us and attempting to rescue the suspect Lemuel.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member C

attributes.content: Calling all combat units, we need backup!
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member C

attributes.content: I repeat!
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member C

attributes.content: A-Again!
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Now the left staircase... blow it up and I can slow them down for a little longer...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Do you read me, El?! I'm here to save you!
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: Vani?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Haha! Sick idea! I never expected you to find out the secret of this confessional and use it to help me out!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I-It's nothing. It took me so long to finally realize there is something unusual with its plate number. I noticed it when you stopped it before, but I didn't think too much.
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: All confessionals start with 'LC', for 'Laterano automated mobile Confessional', but this one starts with 'ELC'...
attributes.name: Vannini

attributes.content: She practically scanned the entire city, stopping confessionals one by one... until I noticed her.
attributes.name: Automated Confessional

attributes.content: Alright, Exusiai. Pontifica Cohors reinforcements will be here soon, and the Nurtury guards are also on the move. We need to get out now.
attributes.name: Automated Confessional

attributes.content: Coming right up!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: The guards respond quickly, constructing an emergency passage upstairs, assembling to face the chaos.

Exusiai breaks the door open as the confessional speeds up toward her, blocking bullets from the Pontifica Cohors. She hops onto the vehicle, and steadies herself as the confessional wobbles wildly from her landing.
The Sankta's red hair flutters between the bullets and gunsmoke.
Confessor... uh, wait, you've been exposed, so we can go back to normal, right?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Leader, savior, Doctor! You're! So! Awesome!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.options: There's six guns on the front outer rack.;There's three guns in here.
Feel free to use them as you please.;Do what you do best.
Vannini switched out the bullets for non-lethal ones.;As for whether they'll hurt your countrymen, I'll trust your aim.

attributes.content: Gotcha! Talk about perfect timing, the Seventh Tribunal confiscated my guns.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.options: The passages on both sides are hard to break through.;We need a new escape route.

attributes.content: Then through the windows we go. The noisier, the better. We draw attention, and make it easier for Vani to slip away.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You won't fall apart, will you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.options: Hold on tight. I can't promise I won't fling you out.;I'll take the wheel, you handle our tail.

attributes.content: Got it. The party's about to begin, so let's show them what a perfect pair can do!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You don't know how Exusiai manages to wield so many guns at once to suppress all the Pontifica Cohors guardsmen with a hail of bullets.
You're also unsure if falling from a window this high will pose a problem back in reality.
All you do, is take her and zoom to the sky!
Divine judgment!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Rock n' roll!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Barrage!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Apple... uh, never mind! Not the best place for that.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Phew! I'm beat—
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Finally shook off the stragglers. That was tight. Since when did they react so fast...?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Sure enough, you took to the roofs, El.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Always the contrarian, ever since you were little.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: S-Sis?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: What's with the confessional, and that girl?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Oh, just good friends of mine.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You said all this law-breaking is about waking Laterano up?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You were never the type to talk theory or explain something away with fancy rhetoric.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: By 'wake Laterano up', you mean to rouse everyone in the city awake?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: ...It's complicated.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Look at me, El.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Yeah?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Separated by roof ridges, Lemuen looks at her sister. The sun is unbearably bright, but she said 'look at me' so gently that Exusiai does not even blink before complying.
For a long time, Lemuen and Exusiai stand unspeaking. Silence links the two.
Go.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: You're letting me walk away?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You were only just created a cardinal of the Seventh Tribunal. If they find out you let a prime suspect go, you're as good as defrocked, aren't you?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: Remember when the gunsmith had me pick a serial number for my guardian gun?
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Of course I remember. You didn't even mull it over—you just went straight for the date Mamma and Tata brought you home.
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: I told myself then, to protect you and them forever.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Hey, sis, aren't you afraid they'll say you're covering for me?
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: You don't get it, El.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: When choosing whom or what to protect, trust comes first.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: The time we spent together, the empathy and understanding between us... That's why I trust my sister, why I trust that she's making the right call.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: So the way I see it, I'm not covering for you just because you're my sister. In fact, there's plenty other reasons for me to do this.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Um... why don't you come with me, sis?!
attributes.name: Exusiai

attributes.content: No.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Your doubts... I've been having them too.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: Maybe there are some things I can still do, in my position.
attributes.name: Lemuen

attributes.content: I think it's this way?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member A

attributes.content: Yeah, we followed them all the way here—weird. They just vanished.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member B

attributes.content: They're so fast... Do confessional engines have that power?
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member B

attributes.content: There're too many forks here. Plus, Lemuel split ways from the confessional...
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member A

attributes.content: Contact the Notarial Hall and request executor support.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member A

attributes.content: Also, have them scan all mobile confessionals on the intercity net to see if they can find one designated 'ELC-001'.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member A

attributes.content: Roger.
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member B

attributes.content: Look, up ahead—
attributes.name: Pontifica Cohors Member B

attributes.content: (Grinds teeth)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Pedaling fiercely)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Phew, finally managed to catch up to you after clearing out your escape route.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I won't let the Laterans tear you apart.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: You know, I have to commend your sharp senses. You figured out Laterano was facing a calamity based on just a few Sankta Operators' peculiar reports.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It might have been too late, had we waited any longer to make our move.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: It's only been a few months since everything happened at Rhodes Island...;We have to be on guard for anything strange cropping up.
Amiya is contacting our branch office operators...;Closure is busy restructuring the new plates...;Our Elite Operators are making sure the landship is secure...
While you didn't take more than a second to decide to come with me.

attributes.content: You're welcome. Though, it used to always be...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Alright, Dr. {@nickname}. What's next?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: We were hiding for so long, but now our efforts have gone to waste!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: We need to make sure Exusiai can move unhindered.;There's no longer any point in hiding our tracks.

attributes.content: True. The strange ritual's over, and people have already woken from the 'dream'.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I'm sure the machine is already reacting, and the Curia and Nutury are speeding things up on their respective ends.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Does it still want everyone to finish their dreams, to complete its... uh, 'experiment'?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: I can't use any of my skills here, and their comms control's turned you into this!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: They've cut down your engine power too. You move pretty slow now—
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Well, I couldn't find anything else to drag you around either, so!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Grits teeth)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: ...Doctor!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Open your door!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: There's a couple of donuts in there—*chomp*—I have to refill my energy!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Grinds teeth)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Running wildly, brandishing claws)
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Are you holding on?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: I'm kind of used to it...;I'm fine. It's just like how you used to carry me around.

attributes.content: Now's not the time for jokes, Doctor!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: The Shrine of Nurtury incubated these monsters with halos in the 'dream', but how did they get them to invade reality?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: Look at the projections on the buildings.;Notice the strange colors around us?

attributes.content: Wow, sharp eyes to notice all these little details while I'm dragging you at high speed!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Glad you have excellent dynamic visual acuity—
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Uh oh, they're catching up! Alright, hold on tight—
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: So, what strange stuff were you talking about anyway?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: It's not the 'dream' collapsing that's affecting reality.;The 'dream' is just a facade. It's already using reality itself.

attributes.content: So the chaos in Laterano wasn't caused by that machine going haywire—
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: It's the opposite! It dragged everyone into this collective dream just so it could maximize its synchronization efficiency, and output a pre-programmed result!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: —Which it could do, if it was running at full power.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Doctor, we have to know...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.options: What it ultimately wants Laterano to become.;What exactly prompted it to make this decision.
Mon3tr, have you found the 'connection point' yet?

attributes.content: I've tried various methods ever since we came to Laterano with our lead in hand and entered the 'dream', but...
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: (Shakes head aggressively) The machine's operating logic is too unique. I need more time.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: We're already exposed in both dreamland and reality, Doctor.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: The city is rejecting us like a virus.
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: So, our current priority is to... huff... stay alive!
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Calamity is already here, you're certain.
But there's no time to express any regret as you and Mon3tr rush through illusion and reality, fleeing...
No, looking for a lead on the trail of your fate.
This trip to Laterano has been perilous, yet the bumpy ride somehow helps you shelve some of your concerns.
Unconsciously, you have already entrusted your life to her...
To Mon3tr.
Whuh?
attributes.name: Mon3tr

attributes.content: Is that...?
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: I thought I was seeing things.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Shall we go greet our mutual friend?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: Keep moving, Arturia.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Are you not worried about the Doctor?
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I am worried.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: But it is not my top priority at the moment.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: It is the first time I have seen that woman who took the Doctor away, but her appearance and combat style are familiar to me. With her, the Doctor is not in imminent danger.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Also, the Doctor has drawn away many of the monsters, and created an opportunity for us to escape. We should leave at once, and locate the Pope.
attributes.name: Federico

attributes.content: Fede, I'll help you add what you just said into your mission report for Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Arturia

attributes.content: I will write it myself.
attributes.name: Federico
